abstract: Is Carl C. Icahn buying Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer bonds “like a bat out of hell”? Deadline Hollywood cited one film financing source as saying that the billionaire investor was snapping them up.
snippet: Is Carl C. Icahn buying Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer bonds “like a bat out of hell”? Deadline Hollywood cited one film financing source as saying that the billionaire investor was snapping them up.
lead_paragraph: Is Carl C. Icahn buying  Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer bonds “like a bat out of hell”? That’s the word, according to Hollywood blogger Nikki Finke.

headline.main: Is Icahn Swooping Down on MGM?
